title: Skins aren't worth ten dollars each
body:
Sure, some 1350 skins have a few added particles but most are the same quality of a 975 skin. I've bought lots of skins over my years, don't get me wrong, but this is getting sort of ridiculous. 

It always felt good to buy a few skins and then buy one with the leftover RP you had. Can't do that anymore. I have a feeling the new price of skins in Season 8 is going to be 1820.

top kek
